overview: A psychopath lives in an abandoned house with his doll Rita. He secretly photographs young vegetarians among whom he chooses his victims. So he kidnaps them, forces them into carnal adcts before killing them. Until one of them manages to free herself and dares to face her
tagline: A psychopath lives in an abandoned house with his doll Rita....
title: Vegetarierinnen zur Fleischeslust gezwungen 2
